#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
#define N 5000001
#define ll long long int
#define gc getchar
using namespace std;
template<class T>
void scan(T &x)
{
    register T c = gc();
    x = 0;
    T neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}
int main()
{
    int n,i,j,t=0;
    ll sum,count;
    while(1)
    {
    	t++;
    	sum=0,count=0;
    	scan(n);
    	int a[n];
    	if(n==0)
    	break;
    	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    	{
    		cin>>a[i];
    		sum=sum+a[i];
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    	{
    		if(a[i]<(sum/n))
    		count+=((sum/n)-a[i]);
		}
		 cout<<"Set #"<<t<<endl<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<count<<"."<<endl<<endl;
		
    }
}
